mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcPoIssueMapper.selectCdcList] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.WH_LOC_ID AS CODE_ID , A.WH_LOC_CODE AS CODE_CD , A.WH_LOC_DESC AS CODE_NAME , B.STATE ||' '|| B.CITY ||' '|| B.AREA ||' '|| A.STREET ||' '|| A.ADDR_DTL AS ADDRESS , NVL(A.WH_LOC_TEL1, A.WH_LOC_TEL2 ) AS TEL_NO , A.REM AS CODE FROM SYS0028M A , SYS0064M B WHERE A.AREA_ID = B.AREA_ID(+) AND A.WH_LOC_CODE IN ('3010', '3020', '3030')

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcPoIssueMapper.selectHcPoIssueSubList] - KR JIN */ SELECT PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , STOCK_ID , STOCK_CODE , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = A.STOCK_ID AND STK_CODE = A.STOCK_CODE) as STOCK_NAME , SUPLY_ITEM_CD , PO_QTY , UOM , PO_UPRC , SUPLY_PRC , TAX , TAX_CD , LOCAL_AMT , (SUPLY_PRC+TAX) AS TOTAL , CUR , PO_DTL_STS_CD , FREX_AMT , RM , USE_YN , CRT_DT , CRT_USER_ID , UPD_DT , UPD_USER_ID FROM HMC0005D a WHERE PO_NO = #{sPoNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY PO_NO, PO_DTL_NO
mapper.update: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcPoIssueMapper.updateHcPoIssueMain] - KR JIN */ UPDATE HMC0004M --HomeCare PO Master SET PO_TY_CD = #{poTyCd} -- PO TYPE CD(428) , CDC = #{cdc} -- CDC , MEM_ACC_ID = #{memAccId} -- vendor , PO_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , CDC_DUE_DT = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{cdcDueDt}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 'YYYYMMDD') , PO_STS_CD = (SELECT MAX(CODE_ID) FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '429' AND DISAB = 0 AND CODE = #{poStsCd}) , USE_YN = 'Y' , BASE_EXR = #{baseExr} , CUR = #{cur} , RM = #{rm} , ISSUE_USR_ID = null , ISSUE_DT = null , ISSUE_RSN = null , APPR_USR_ID = null , APPR_DT = null , APPR_RSN = null , UPD_DT = SYSDATE , UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId} WHERE 1 = 1 AND PO_NO = #{poNo} --PO No
mapper.insert: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcPoIssueMapper.insertHcPoIssueSub] - KR JIN */ INSERT INTO HMC0005D --HomeCare PO Detail ( PO_NO --PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO --Po Detail No , STOCK_ID --Material ID , STOCK_CODE --Material Code(ECC) , SUPLY_ITEM_CD --Material Number Used by Supplyer , PO_QTY --PO QTY , CONFIRM_QTY --Confirm QTY , UOM --unit of measure(42) , CUR --currency(94) , PO_UPRC --Base PO Price , SUPLY_PRC --Supply Price , TAX --SST Amount , TAX_CD --Tax Code(430) , LOCAL_AMT --Local Amount , FREX_AMT --Foreign Exchange Amount , PO_DTL_STS_CD --Status Code(427) , RM --Remark , USE_YN --Use Flag , CRT_DT --Create Date , CRT_USER_ID --Create User Id , UPD_DT --Update Date , UPD_USER_ID --Update User Id )VALUES( #{poNo} --PO_NO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(PO_DTL_NO),0)+1 FROM HMC0005D WHERE PO_NO = #{poNo}) , #{stockId} --Material ID , #{stockCode} --Material Code(ECC) , #{suplyItemCd} --Material Number Used by Supplyer , #{poQty} --PO QTY , 0 , #{uom} --unit of measure(42) , #{cur} --currency(94) , #{poUprc} --Base PO Price , #{suplyPrc} --Supply Price , #{tax} --SST Amount , #{taxCd} --Tax Code(430) , 0 --Local Amount , #{frexAmt} --Foreign Exchange Amount , #{poDtlStsCd} --Status Code(427) , #{rm} --Remark , 'Y' , SYSDATE , #{crtUserId} --Create User Id , SYSDATE , #{updUserId} --Update User Id )
